text: A baby's brain development relies on overall stimulation, with various factors playing crucial roles. Nutrition is just one small part of the equation.
Each baby is unique, with distinct developmental needs that require personalized monitoring and care. Even siblings raised in a single family are so distinct.
Right-brain stimulation is particularly crucial during the early years. The UpTodd research-backed program emphasizes on brain development activities.
Children often mimic how parents or caregivers express emotions, including anger. It's essential to model calm behavior to influence child's emotional development.
